In our bid to provide more information based career decisions to the student population and increase overall awareness about research opportunities available, our next post from Arna Ghosh describes his experience as a research intern in University of British Columbia. Moreover, he throws light on minute nuisances related to research internships making it a go-to guide for all your related queries. Thanks Arna for the post. http://swgiitkgp.in/fores...
